title: Is killing the Scuttle Crab while it's eating Honey Fruit a re-portable offense?
body: Because if it isn't, it should be. Fucking savages.

They should make an interaction with the new Rift Herald where she attacks you if you attack Scuttle while he's eating.

Or, even better! If Scuttle sees you fighting Rift Herald, she comes up behind you and ~~one shots you~~ makes little, aggressive biting/scratching motions (no damage) like she's trying to protect Rift Herald.

It would be adorable!
I'd like to see her roar aggressively in your direction a few times if she sees you bullying scuttle.
